name: festival fever blanket
notes:
this is the ‘festival fever’ blanket designed by eleonora tully for king cole. this will be a free 6 week crochet-along (cal) starting on 20th june 2025.

this blanket is a colourful celebration of festivals, gatherings, parties and feasts! worked in rows with an eclectic mix of crochet stitches, textures and bright, happy colours, this blanket is inspired by that festival feeling - a true feast for the eyes! 

measurements: the finished blanket measures approximately 95cm x 135cm (37.5in x 53in) using king cole big value dk.

for more information and all the yarn details head on over to the king cole and coastal crochet websites:

https://coastalcrochet.com/2025/05/09/introducing-festival-fever/

https://www.kingcole.com/festival-fever-a-crochet-along-blanket/
